    FCTPpop
    public class PEheur
extends FCTPls
    Heuristics for the Fixed Charge Transportation Problem (FCTP)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PEheur.RandomCollection<E>
      Class for creating a set which you can draw from with probabilities proportional to some evaluation measure (weight) See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6409652/random-weighted-selection-in-java

    • Method Detail

      • get_greedy_values

        public double[] get_greedy_values()
        Greedy1 evaluation
        Returns:
        Array of cost per unit sent on each arc at full capacity

      • get_greedy_values_2

        public double[] get_greedy_values_2​(int k)
        Greedy2 evaluation, calculates cost per unit at full capacity with average value of k best arcs from each supplier/customer subtracted.
        Parameters:
        k - number of best customers/suppliers to calculate average over
        Returns:
        Array of greedy evaluations

      • get_greedy_values_3

        public double[] get_greedy_values_3​(int k)
        Greedy3 evaluation. Equal to greedy2 valuation, but additional minimal cost per unit if full supply or demand is not med added
        Parameters:
        k - number of best customers/suppliers to calculate average over
        Returns:
        Array of greedy evaluations

      • get_random_collection

        public PEheur.RandomCollection<java.lang.Integer> get_random_collection​(double[] greedy_vals,
                                                                        boolean smaller_is_better)
        Get a random collection with weights according to evaluation measure.
        Parameters:
        greedy_vals - Array where the i'th entry has an evaluation of the i'th arc
        smaller_is_better - Whether or not a small value is better in the evaluation measure
        Returns:
        A random collection instance

      • RNLS

        public void RNLS​(int max_iter,
                 int splits)
        Random neighbourhood local search
        Parameters:
        max_iter - maximum number of iterations
        splits - the number of partitions of the total neighbourhood, governs size of random neighbourhood

      • Kicksolution_greedy

        public void Kicksolution_greedy​(int num_exchanges,
                                PEheur.RandomCollection<java.lang.Integer> rc)
        Introduces num_exchanges new arcs into the basis with probabilities according to an evaluation measure
        Parameters:
        num_exchanges - - number of non-basic arcs to be made basic. If equal to zero, this number is randomly decided (between 5 arcs and 20% of the basic arcs)
        rc - - a RandomCollection object with evaluation of each arc

      • get_max_k_idx

        public static int[] get_max_k_idx​(double[] array,
                                  int k)
        Find indices of K biggest numbers in an array
        Parameters:
        array - the array to find indices from
        k - the number indices to find
        Returns:
        array of length k containing the k indices

      • modified_cost_local_search

        public void modified_cost_local_search​(int cost_type,
                                       int n_kicked)
        Modified cost local search. 'Kick out arcs' from current solution by increasing fixed costs of n_kicked worst arcs according to cost type
        Parameters:
        cost_type - Value between 1 and 6, indicating gvals1, gvals2, gvals3, per unit, random and arc evaluation measure
        n_kicked - Number of arcs kicked out. If equal to zero, this number is randomly decided (between 5 arcs and 20% of the basic arcs).

      • get_arc_costs_from_array

        public double[] get_arc_costs_from_array​(double[] eval_array)
        Assign cost to each arc in current solution at full capacity according to array of costs
        Parameters:
        eval_array - Array with arc evaluations
        Returns:
        Array of evaluations of length narcs, which is 0 for all arcs outside current solution

      • get_arc_costs_per_unit

        public double[] get_arc_costs_per_unit()
        Calculate cost of each arc in current solution per unit
        Returns:
        Array of costs of length narcs, which is 0 for all arcs outside current solution

      • get_random_arc_costs

        public double[] get_random_arc_costs()
        Assign random cost to each arc for the purpose of random evaluations
        Returns:
        Array of random costs of length narcs

      • Evaluation_based_IRNLS

        public void Evaluation_based_IRNLS​(PEheur.RandomCollection<java.lang.Integer> rc,
                                   int max_runs)
        Evaluation based ILS
        Parameters:
        rc - Random collection to draw arcs from
        max_runs - Maximum number of iterations without improvement to the objective value

      • intensify_diversify

        public FCTPsol[] intensify_diversify​(FCTPsol[] init_sols,
                                     int max_runs,
                                     boolean v2)
        Takes array of solutions and calculates arc evaluation measures based on the average solution value in solutions where the arc is present. Then, based on these evaluations an Evaluation based IRNLS i done Afterwards, we reverse the evaluations and do the Evaluation based IRNLS again.
        Parameters:
        init_sols - Array of high quality solutions
        max_runs - Maximum number of iterations without improvement to the objective value
        v2 - whether or not to use version 2 of IRNLS
        Returns:
        Array of updated solution after intensification and diversification procedure.

      • IRNLS

        public void IRNLS​(int max_runs)
        Iterated random neighbourhood local search with pool of mutations size 7
        Parameters:
        max_runs - Maximum number of iterations without new best objective value. If 0, it is set to FCTPparam.max_no_imp

      • IRNLS_v2

        public void IRNLS_v2​(int max_runs)
        Another version of IRNLS
        Parameters:
        max_runs - Maximum number of iterations without new best objective value. If 0, it is set to FCTPparam.max_no_imp

      • Evaluation_based_IRNLS_v2

        public void Evaluation_based_IRNLS_v2​(PEheur.RandomCollection<java.lang.Integer> rc,
                                      int max_runs)
        Evaluation based ILS, second version.
        Parameters:
        rc - Random collection to draw arcs from
        max_runs - Maximal number of runs without improvement

      • PIRNLS

        public void PIRNLS​(int[] population_sizes,
                   int[] max_runs,
                   boolean v2)
        A population based iterated random neighbourhood local search
        Parameters:
        population_sizes - A list of decreasing population sizes, e.g. [100, 50, 10] will create 100 initial solutions with IRNLS, and then apply the population based procedure with these 100 as start, then take the best resulting 50 solutions, and finally the resulting best 10
        max_runs - List of max runs for IRNLS in each step, e.g. [800, 1500, 2000]
        v2 - Whether or not to use v2 of IRNLS and Evaluation based IRNLS
